ceo_buyer.justification: The document is signed: On Behalf of the Board of Directors, Novo Resources Corp. “Michael Spreadborough” Michael Spreadborough Executive Co-Chairman and Acting CEO.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction involves acquiring different interests in two separate mining leases that form part of the project: 'a 100% interest in mining lease 45/202 and a 70% interest in mining lease 45/1163'. A single overall interest percentage for the Bamboo Creek project is not provided.

currency.justification: The buyer, Novo Resources Corp., is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange, and market data is quoted in CAD: 'CAD|TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE|DELAYE'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration was paid entirely in shares, with no cash component mentioned. The text states the company issued common shares in exchange for the interest.

share_payments_raw.justification: While shares were issued as payment, their corresponding monetary value is not stated in the text. The payment was defined by the number of shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No combined cash and share value was provided for the transaction.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The Company has issued 8,431 common shares to the Creasy Group (the “Second Completion Shares”)...

issued_share_price.justification: The price per share for the 8,431 issued shares was not mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment defined by drilling meters was mentioned in the documents.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

exploration_commitment_desc.justification: No exploration commitment was described as part of the transaction terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: There is no mention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) being acquired or retained as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text provides a total land package size for all of Novo's projects ('approximately 10,500 square kilometres') but does not provide a specific area for the Bamboo Creek project itself.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area value was found for the project.

resource_size.justification: The text describes the project as 'prospective for orogenic gold, silver and base metal mineralisation' but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company is identified in the text as 'Novo Resources Corp. (“Novo” or the “Company”) (TSX: NVO, NVO.WT & NVO.WT.A)'.
